name: Twisty Road.
description:
◆Stay on the Sling Drift game and do as many zig zags as you can in the Sky!◆

Just tap the screen to change the direction of the ball. Try not to fall off the edges else you will be die alone in the endless Sky!

Tap to switch the direction! How fast can you react?? Lets try!!!

Sound simple? Challenge yourself in this amazing free adventure game!

Sling Drift Wall features:
- Awesome graphics that bring the best out of this endless tap tap game
- Simple yet challenging gameplay that count on your quick reaction
- Complete Google Play Game Data integration with leaderboards and achievements and check how much you crossed maximum in the endless Sky

How to play :
- Tap to switch directions
- Don't fall off the edges!

What is your best Score? Check this data in leaderboards!!!

◆◆◆◆◆ A SUPER FREE GAME ◆◆◆◆◆ The game in itself is free. To support our expenses we had to integrate Ads. But thats not at the cost of user experience. If you feel we have done a good job then please rate us."
